PAGE_GREETING.TITLE: Hi
PAGE_GREETING.SUBTITLE: before we get started a reaaally short introduction to the basic functions of this app!

PAGE_1.TITLE: Every week you can find a brand-new and free Workout of the week here.

PAGE_2.TITLE: Here you can do all our workouts – the most important part of the app!

PAGE_3.TITLE: Obviously not without a proper Warm Up!

PAGE_EXTRA.TITLE: If you like..
PAGE_EXTRA.SUBTITLE: ... you could give us some additional information. The data will be kept confidential, will not be disclosed and you would really help us making Breakletics better!

SETTINGS.SUBSCRIBER-1: In order to cancel the subscription, you need to open one of the emails that has been sent to you by our payment provider Digistore24. In this mail you need to click on the link An overview of the order can be found here.
SETTINGS.SUBSCRIBER-2: On this overview you can find a button. By clicking on it you cancel your subscription. From there on, your account will not be charged again and you keep your access until the end of the billing period.
SETTINGS.SUBSCRIBER-3: If you have problems canceling your subscription by yourself, please send an email to info@breakletics.com and we will take care of that for you!
